parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post mentions "primar Maria Huțu" (PSD) and "primarul PNL Domunco Dumitru-Ovidiu".  It directly refers to candidates by name and implicitly to their affiliated parties (PSD and PNL).</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide geographical area in Botoșani County, Romania, as evidenced by the `aaa_info` section specifying numerous localities.  The post's nature is public, not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The core of the post is a comparison between the performance of two mayors from different parties (PSD and PNL) leading up to the June 2024 elections. The question "Cât de încrezători sunt locuitorii #Comuna_Vârful_Câmpului că au votat ce trebuie la alegerile din iunie 2024?" directly aims to influence voters' opinions and potentially their future voting choices. The implicit suggestion is that one mayor's performance is superior to the other's, thus influencing voters' choices.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The comparative approach and the leading question strongly suggest an intention to sway public opinion rather than simply inform.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's presenting a biased comparison intended to influence voters' perceptions of the candidates.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1118428286643213</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Vocea - Botosani, directly compares the performance of two mayoral candidates from different parties (PSD and PNL) in the context of the June 2024 elections.  The post's leading question aims to influence voters' opinions and potentially their voting behavior. The targeting of numerous localities in Botoșani County further amplifies its potential impact. While the post doesn't explicitly endorse or condemn either candidate, the comparative approach is inherently biased and serves an electoral objective.  The lack of journalistic objectivity and the clear intention to influence voters' choices strongly suggest this constitutes electoral propaganda.  The post's reach (100K-500K) and spend (under RON 100) further support this conclusion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Maria Huțu</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Domunco Dumitru-Ovidiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea - Botoșani</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea - Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID 1118428286643213), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care prezintă o comparație tendențioasă între performanța primarului Maria Huțu (PSD) și primarul PNL Domunco Dumitru-Ovidiu, în contextul alegerilor din iunie 2024, cu scopul evident de a influența votul alegătorilor.  Întrebarea sugestivă „Cât de încrezători sunt locuitorii #Comuna_Vârful_Câmpului că au votat ce trebuie la alegerile din iunie 2024?”  și vizarea unor multiple localități din județul Botoșani, conform datelor din Ad Library, demonstrează clar intenția de a influența votul.  Postarea, cu o estimare a bugetului sub RON 100 și o potențială audiență de 100.000-500.000 persoane, constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Contactul Vocea - Botoșani este office@voceabotosani.ro și +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
